NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Ads
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video includes mild advertisement and product placement. It doubles the view revenue at the cost of lowering the subscriber chance.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Obnoxious ads
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video includes obnoxious, annoying product placement. Whilst it triples the view revenue, it greatly reduces subscriber chance and may actually cause subscribers to unsubscribe.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Rushed
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video is rushed and the quality is substandard, however it takes much less time to produce. It may result in lower subscriber count.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: High Quality
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video is took a long time to make and is very well thought out. While it takes twice as long to produce, it may result in much higher subscriber count.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Voice over
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video includes a voice over from the streamer. Based on social skill of the streamer, it may attract more or less new views.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Documentary
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video has the elements of a documentary. Based on intellectual skill of the streamer, it may attract more or less new views.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Creativity
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video is very creative. Based on artistic skill of the streamer, it may attract more or less new views.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Tutorial
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video provides step-by-step instructions on a specific topic. It attracts viewers who want to learn, leading to a potential increase in views, at the cost of slightly longer production time.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Comedy Skit
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: A funny and entertaining video that makes viewers laugh. Might generate more views but not necessarily more subscribers.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Controversial Topic
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: A video that tackles a divisive or hot-topic issue. May increase views rapidly but risk losing subscribers.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Behind the Scenes
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: A glimpse into the daily life or the making of a video. Generally well-received and may result in new subscribers, but doesn't drastically increase view count.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Collaboration
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: Features another VidTuber or guest. May draw fans from both channels, potentially increasing views, but it may also result in less views, as not everyone wants to watch collaborations.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Tech Review
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: A detailed analysis of a new gadget or technology. Depending on the current technological progress of the colony, it can result in more or less new views.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Mystery/Thriller
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: A suspenseful video that keeps viewers on the edge of their seats. May generate more views from intrigued viewers.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Storytime
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: Narrating a story or personal experience. Can be intriguing and lead to more subscribers if the story is captivating.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Animals and Pets
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video showcases or discusses different animals. Based on animal skill of the streamer, it may attract more or less new views.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: DIY
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: Sharing crafting recipes or DIY tricks relevant to every day life. Based on crafting skill of the streamer, it may attract more or less new views.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Cooking Recipes
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: Sharing cooking recipes using various ingredients. Based on cooking skill of the streamer, it may attract more or less new views.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Series
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video is a part of a series. While it may not attract too many new views, those that do watch it may have a higher chance to subscribe in order to see more.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Short
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video is a part of the experimental VidTube Shorts platform. It takes very little time to make, but it will not attract any subscribers.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Demonetized
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video, while unique and interesting, is demonetized. This may attract new viewers and subscribers, but will not generate any revenue what-so-ever.

NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.label: Webcam
NoobertNebulous.VideoTagDef.description: This video features a webcam footage showing the streamer. Based on the beauty of the streamer, it may attract new subscribers.
